description.lang: The Multi Sensor is a product for IoT with several sensors and with functions of Z-Wave communication. It can collect sensing data that temperature, humidity, Luminance, human motion, and door open/close by using a magnet. And it sends the data to the gateway.The Multi Sensor has the following general features:-Z-Wave communication-Sensing with the followingTemperature sensor,Humidity sensor,Luminance sensor,Human detect sensor (motion sensor by pyroelectric infrared sensor),Open/Close sensor (detecting the opening and shutting of the door by using a magnet),Tamper switch.
Z-Wave Plus Lifeline

name.lang: Enable switch of Multilevel Sensor report

description.lang: Configure arbitrarily to send which sensor values. The sensor values can be selected from Humidity, Luminance, and Temperature.
Humidity disable, Luminance disable, Temperature disable
Humidity disable, Luminance disable, Temperature enable
Humidity disable, Luminance enable, Temperature disable
Humidity disable, Luminance enable, Temperature enable
Humidity enable, Luminance disable, Temperature disable
Humidity enable, Luminance disable, Temperature enable
Humidity enable, Luminance enable, Temperature disable
Humidity enable, Luminance enable, Temperature enable

name.lang: Enable switch of Alarm Notification report

description.lang: Configure to send which the sensor values arbitralily. The sensor values can be selectedfrom Human Detect and Open/Close.
Human Detect disable, Open/Close disable
Human Detect disable, Open/Close enable
Human Detect enable, Open/Close disable
Human Detect enable, Open/Close enable

name.lang: Select switch of Luminance Sensor scale

description.lang: Configure the Luminance Sensor scale to either percentage value or Lux.
Percentage value
Lux
Configure the sending interval time of the sensor value which is selected by configuration parameter number 1.u00220u0022 means especially synchronizing withWake Up Interval.
synchronizing with Wake Up Interval
The setting unit is seconds.
